info.name: Crowd Management System - Complete API
info.description:
Complete unified API collection for Crowd Management System Backend
Includes all original and new endpoints
Last updated: 2025-11-10

item.name: Get Current Density for All Areas

body.raw:
{
  "user_id": "{{user_id}}",

request.description: Upload a photo for a lost person report. Accepts image files (jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp).
Delete the photo associated with a lost person report.

body.raw:
{
  "event_id": "{{event_id}}",
  "title": "Crowd Surge Warning",
  "message": "High density detected at Main Stage. Please move to alternate areas.",
  "alert_type": "warning",
  "severity": "high"
}

{
  "event_id": "{{event_id}}",
  "title": "Emergency Evacuation",
  "message": "Please proceed to nearest emergency exit immediately. Follow staff instructions.",
  "alert_type": "emergency",
  "severity": "critical"
}

{
  "event_id": "{{event_id}}",
  "title": "Event Update",
  "message": "Next performance starts in 15 minutes at Main Stage.",
  "alert_type": "info",
  "severity": "low"
}

{
  "event_id": "{{event_id}}",
  "temperature": 35.5,
  "humidity": 78.0,
  "condition": "Hot and Humid",
  "wind_speed": 5.2,
  "description": "High temperature alert - increased risk of heatstroke"
}

formdata.description: Select an image file containing people to count.  FIRST TIME: Model download may take 30-60 seconds!

exec: pm.test("Response has person_count as integer", function () {
